MAN.TITLE: tk_getfile
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: dialog to get a file path

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a character string which gives the file mask to use for file selection. file_mask is written with Unix convention. the default value is '*'.
: a character string which gives the initial directory used for file search. by default tk_getfile uses the previously selected directory.
: is the user selected file path if user answers "Ok" or the " " string if user answers "Cancel"
:Optional arguments which gives the title for the tk_getfile window.

DESCRIPTION.P: Creates a dialog window for file selection

MAN.EXAMPLE: tk_getfile() tk_getfile('*.sci','SCI/macros/xdess') tk_getfile(title='Choose a file name ')
